title: saxydev
author: saxydev
content: Hello,I am looking for this paper: Discerning payment patterns in Bitcoin from ransomware attacksI will pay 5$ in xmr for it.Send PM with the full link and xmr address

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Hi! @saxydev,I have the research paper with the title you have mentioned. Can I confirm if the researchers are Adam B. Turner, Stephen McCombie and Allon J. Uhlmann? Also, I am using OnionShare, however, there is a small caveat, you need to download ToR browser to be able to open the link and download the pdf.I don't mind the XMR either. You can just keep it to yourself.

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on June 14, 2022, 09:54:18 AMHi! @saxydev,I have the research paper with the title you have mentioned. Can I confirm if the researchers are Adam B. Turner, Stephen McCombie and Allon J. Uhlmann? Also, I am using OnionShare, however, there is a small caveat, you need to download ToR browser to be able to open the link and download the pdf.I don't mind the XMR either. You can just keep it to yourself.Yes, that's the paper I am interested in. Onionshare is perfect for me, I also replied to your PM.
